name: Sausd Website Redesign
description: Redesign sausd school websites to a simpler dark mode version of it. This style takes away some useless elements that, let's be honest, we don't use at all. This may be broken on other schools' websites, but that's because I focused on Saddlebacks.
additional_info: Some text may be unreadable due to a white box, I'll try to fix it later.
